title: I Do On The Big Screen (Junebug Brides)
description:
When Bri and Lindsey met, it felt like one of those magical movie moments and they quickly got engaged. But when their dream wedding venue fell apart, their plans were put on hold — and then their planner came up with a special way to bring their ceremony to the big screen.

Follow Lindsey and Bri on Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
